attributes.action: Ban all convicted drugs cheats from every representing England or Great Britain EVER in any sport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dwayne Chambers has been selected for the GB World Indoor Championships for nothing more than legal reasons. The selectors don't want him and neither do the public. This man has no shame, he has used vast amounts of drugs to gain an unfair advantage over his peers and now a gifted clean athlete with lose his opportunity to run for his country. By allowing him to compete we are by association promoting drug use.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
